a: Absolutely! Your thoughts are yours alone. We use top-tier encryption and security to keep your entries private, just like a locked personal diary.

q: Can I categorize my journal entries?
a: Of course! Organize your thoughts using folders, tags, and collections. You can even filter by date, mood, or themes like ‘Travel’, ‘Work’, or ‘Daily Reflections’.

q: How does mood tracking help me?
a: Each entry lets you log your mood, and our insights tool turns it into a visual story—helping you track emotional patterns over time, just like a personal wellness guide.

q: Can I access my journal on my phone?
a: Yes! Our platform works seamlessly on mobile browsers, and a dedicated app is on the way for an even smoother experience.
